title: Sound On: Putin Sanctions Pain, DC Covid Wave
itunes:title: Sound On: Putin Sanctions Pain, DC Covid Wave
description:
Bloomberg Government Congress reporters Jack Fitzpatrick and Emily Wilkins spoke to guests:

Republican Congressman Ralph Norman of South Carolina, Matt Bennett, co-founder of Third Way, Greta Joynes, co-chair of Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck's technology and telecommunications practice, and Hagar Chemali, CEO of Greenwich Media Strategies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
